registers.info: Power Domain Clock Disable Register

fields.info: Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[3].

values.desc: Enable clocks to logic power domain PD5

values.desc: Enable clocks to logic power domain PD4

Disable clocks to logic power domain PD2

registers.name: GLOBALCTRL1
registers.info: Global Control Register 1

fields.info: PMC/PSCON Power Down

values.desc: Disable the clock to pmctrl_wakeup block, which contains PMC and all PSCONs.

fields.info: Automatic Clock Enable on Wake Up

values.desc: Disable automatic clock wake up.
Enable automatic clock wake up when a power domain transitions to Active state.

registers.name: GLOBALSTAT
registers.info: Global Status Register

fields.info: State of PMC and all PSCONs.

values.desc: PMC and PSCONs for all power domains are in the process of generating power state transition
PMC and PSCONs for all power domains have completed generating power state transition control

registers.name: PRCKEYREG
registers.info: PSCON Diagnostic Compare Key Register

fields.info: Diagnostic PSCON Mode Key. The mode key is applied to all individual PSCON compare units.

values.desc: Lock Step mode
Self-test mode
Error Forcing mode
Self-test Error Forcing Mode
Lock Step mode

registers.name: LPDDCSTAT1
registers.info: LogicPD PSCON Diagnostic Compare Status Register 1

fields.info: Logic Power Domain Compare Error

values.desc: Read: PSCON signals are identical.
Read: PSCON signal compare mismatch identified.

fields.info: Logic Power Domain Self-test Complete

values.desc: Self-test is ongoing if self-test mode is entered.
Self-test is complete.

registers.name: LPDDCSTAT2
registers.info: LogicPD PSCON Diagnostic Compare Status Register 2

fields.info: Logic Power Domain Self-test Error Type

values.desc: Self-test failed during compare match test.
Self-test failed during compare mismatch test.

fields.info: Logic Power Domain Self-test Error

values.desc: Self-test passed.
Self-test failed.

registers.name: MPDDCSTAT1
registers.info: Memory PD PSCON Diagnostic Compare Status Register 1

fields.info: Memory Power Domain Compare Error

values.desc: Read: PSCON signals are identical.
Read: PSCON signal compare mismatch identified.

fields.info: Memory Power Domain Self-test Complete

values.desc: Self-test is ongoing if self-test mode is entered.
Self-test is complete.

registers.name: MPDDCSTAT2
registers.info: Memory PD PSCON Diagnostic Compare Status Register 2

fields.info: Memory Power Domain Self-test Error Type

values.desc: Self-test failed during compare match test.
Self-test failed during compare mismatch test.

fields.info: Memory Power Domain Self-test Error

values.desc: Self-test passed.
Self-test failed.

registers.name: ISODIAGSTAT

fields.info: Isolation Diagnostic

values.desc: Isolation is enabled for corresponding power domain
